title: OK
author: Victor Gutierrez
content:
# Building High-Performance Teams: Lessons from Transforming Underperforming Squads

As a technical leader, one of the most challenging yet rewarding experiences I've had was transforming an underperforming engineering team into a company reference. This 18-month journey taught me invaluable lessons about leadership, culture, and the technical practices that drive high-performance teams.

## The Starting Point: A Team in Crisis
